name: Ham, Egg, and Cheese Quesadillas
author: Smithfield
summary: A delightful alternative to breakfast burritos, these quesadillas are filled with flavor-packed protein. The crunchy crust makes for the perfect bite and package with the rich and creamy egg filling and flavorful ham bites. This is the perfect portable breakfast that will keep the kids full and energized to perform well all school-day long.
directions: Scramble eggs with water, salt, and pepper in a medium bowl until well blended
Heat 1 tablespoon butter in a medium nonstick skillet over medium heat
Cook eggs, stirring frequently, until scrambled to desired consistency
Spread 1 teaspoon of butter over 1 tortilla and place butter-side down in a medium nonstick skillet over medium heat
Sprinkle 1/3 cup cheese over entire tortilla
Add 1/2 cup scrambled egg and 1/3 cup Smithfield® cubed ham to one side
Cook 3 minutes or until the cheese is melted
Fold the plain cheese side over the filled side and flip the quesadilla
Cook an additional 2 minutes or until golden and toasted
Repeat with remaining ingredients to make 5 more quesadillas
